verses.name: Romans 5:7
verses.text: For scarcely for a righteous man will one die: yet peradventure for a good man some would even dare to die.

verses.name: Romans 5:8
verses.text: But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.

verses.name: Romans 5:9
verses.text: Much more then, being now justified by his blood, we shall be saved from wrath through him.

verses.name: Romans 5:10
verses.text: For if, when we were enemies, we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son, much more, being reconciled, we shall be saved by his life.
